item.title: US-China tariff talks may provide clues on a possible Trump-Xi meeting
item.description: Top trade officials from China and the United States have launched a new round of talks aimed at easing tensions over tariffs

item.title: Asian shares are mixed after Wall Street sets more records for US stocks
item.description: World stock markets have advanced after the European Union forged a trade deal with the Trump administration

item.title: Hong Kong's CK Hutchison seeks Chinese investor to join Panama Ports deal
item.description: A Hong Kong conglomerate that’s selling ports at the Panama Canal says it may seek a Chinese investor to join a consortium of buyers
